address: Xã EaTrol, Huyện Sông Hinh, Tỉnh Phú Yên
thought:
**Analyzing the Address Transformation: A Confident Conclusion**

Okay, let's break this down. The user has given me an old Vietnamese address (Xã EaTrol, Huyện Sông Hinh, Tỉnh Phú Yên) and wants it mapped to the new administrative structure. My expertise kicks in to navigate this.

First, I identified the components: Ward: EaTrol, District: Sông Hinh, and Province: Phú Yên. Then, I dug into the available resources – the province resolutions (60-NQ/TW) and resolution 1660/NQ-UBTVQH15 – to figure this out.

The province mapping was straightforward. Resolution 60-NQ/TW clearly stated that Phú Yên merged with Đắk Lắk. So, the new province is definitely Đắk Lắk.

The crucial part was resolution 1660. I homed in on lines 74-77. Bingo! Line 77 explicitly mentions "xã Ea Trol" and indicates it's being merged into the new "xã Sông Hinh". It's a key piece of evidence.  I confirmed the district context in lines 74 and 75.

Next, I cross-referenced this resolution information with the list of "New Wards." Sure enough, "Xã Sông Hinh" appears in the list, correctly associated with the new province "Tỉnh Đắk Lắk".

The confidence level here is high. The province mapping is a done deal, and the ward transformation is laid out clearly in the resolution, directly connecting Ea Trol to the new Sông Hinh. The "New Wards" list aligns perfectly, cementing the accuracy.

My output will reflect this certainty. The citation will highlight the critical line (77) from resolution 1660. The confidence level is high. The new province is "Tỉnh Đắk Lắk," the ward code is "22207," and the new ward name is "Xã Sông Hinh." This is the accurate translation of the old address to the new administrative system.

citation.header: 1660/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Đắk Lắk
citation.line: 77. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của thị trấn Hai Riêng, xã Ea Trol, xã Sông Hinh và phần còn lại của xã Ea Bia sau khi sắp xếp theo quy định tại khoản 76 Điều này thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Sông Hinh.
